text: Eduard Fresenius (November 17 1874, Frankfurt am Main – February 10, 1946, Bad Homburg) was a German entrepreneur and pharmacist. In 1912, Eduard Fresenius founded German company Fresenius. Eduard Fresenius was married. Else Fernau, Eduard's foster daughter, and her husband Hans Kröner became leaders of the Fresenius company after the death of Eduard Fresenius. == See also == Fresenius (company) Else Kröner-Fresenius-Foundation == External links == * Official website by Fresenius == References == Category:German pharmacists Category:German company founders Category:20th-century German businesspeople Category:Businesspeople from Frankfurt Category:1874 births Category:1946 deaths
title: Eduard Fresenius
